Trade/Device Name(s): NeoMarkers Rabbit Monoclonal Anti-Human Estrogen Receptor Antibody (Clone SP1)
Specimen Type(s): Formalin fixed, paraffin embedded normal and neoplastic tissues
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for NeoMarkers Rabbit Monoclonal Anti-Human ER Antibody (Clone SP1) for qualitative detection of ER antigen in tissue sections for breast cancer management
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of estrogen receptor antigen in formalin fixed, paraffin embedded tissues by immunohistochemistry as an aid in assessing likelihood of response to therapy and prognosis/management of breast cancer patients
